DOC.brief_summary: This study aim compare short-term effect growth feed tolerance liquid high calorie formula add human milk versus powder human milk fortifier small preterm infant .
DOC.brief_title: Liquid Preterm Formula Versus Powdered Human Milk Fortifier VLBW Infants
DOC.criteria: Infants 500 1499 gram birthweight , receive mother 's milk . Infants major congenital anomaly previous history gastrointestinal disease .
